name: Visual App
tagline: Dallas-Fort Worth Web Design and Search Marketing
description: Visual App is an internet marketing and web design company in Dallas, Texas that assists business-to-business (b2B) and local SMB companies with their online marketing strategy. Our online marketing services include Web Design, Search Engine Optimization (SEO), Search Advertising, Email Marketing, and Social Media management. We have a proven track record of providing our customers with effective Digital Strategy, Lead Generation, Branding and Reputation Management.
